com.github.triceo.splitlog.api

Interface MessageMeasure<T extends Number,S extends MessageProducer<S>>

  • Type Parameters:
    T - The value type returned by the metric.
    S - Where this is getting its Messages from.

    public interface MessageMeasure<T extends Number,S extends MessageProducer<S>>
    Used by MessageMetric to determine how much a Message is worth. Users are discouraged from implementing these as stateful - doing so will result in unpredictable behavior, as a single instance of the class can be shared across multiple MessageMetrics.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      T initialValue()
      The default value for the resulting MessageMetric.
      T update(MessageMetric<T,S> metric, Message evaluate, MessageDeliveryStatus status, S source)
      Update metric after the arrival of another message.

    • Method Detail

      • initialValue

        T initialValue()
        The default value for the resulting MessageMetric.
        Returns:
        Whetever value that the metric should start with.

      • update

        T update(MessageMetric<T,S> metric,
         Message evaluate,
         MessageDeliveryStatus status,
         S source)
        Update metric after the arrival of another message.
        Parameters:
        metric - The metric that is being updated.
        evaluate - The message to evaluate.
        status - Current processing status of the message.
        source - The notifying object.
        Returns:
        The new value for the metric. Message count will be incremented automatically.
